data.title: Good fast food
data.text: Fast and friendly service the burgers were good. Our first time trying in and out and I would definitely go back.

data.title: Best fast food ever!
data.text: This was the first stop we made after getting out of the airport!  Double-double animal style with well done fries...every time!  In fact, three ties last week!  I wish they would open chains in the midwest!

data.title: birthday getaway
data.text: I went in search of an In-N-Out Burger. I have gotten hooked on their burgers and vanilla shakes. #2

data.title: Great burgers, great customer service - every time
data.text:
I went through the In-N-Out drive-through to pick up lunch for our 11 staff members... a somewhat daunting task made a little more intimidating in that it was right before the lunch rush. 

To make things a little easier (for me & for them) I printed out an in-depth order - there was already a line so I readied myself for a long stay. Which never happened.

From the time I gave my order until I got my food, it was 15 minutes - an amazing response time. To make it even better, every order was exactly right - not even one thing missed. As always, In-N-Out goes above & beyond for their customers & I'm so happy we decided to get our staff lunch there.

data.title: You always have to try In N Out!
data.text: Very popular place - limited menu, but that gives the benefit of quick service.  Amazing milk shakes and a large helping of fries (made there on site!)

data.title: Simple hamburgers, Special codes
data.text: This is In-N-Out.  I ate at this place a week before it opened to the public.  I even had an In- N-Out shirt custom made with Sparks on it and wore it that night.   It is a simple menu of hamburgers, fries and shakes until you know the secret codes like 5 by 5, 10 by 10, animal style, and protein style to name a few.  This is fast food but you still wait for them to cook and built your order.  I like thier soft sponge buns.  The burgers are small so you may want a double.  I like my fries cooked a little longer then they cook them but there are codes for that also.  You can even get dressed fries.  Because there is a limited menu the food is consistent and always good.

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: Nice simple menu. This location is always busy but it's worth the wait. Their burgers are excellent and their fries are even better. Everything is fresh and made to order.

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: The food tastes fresh. I like it being so basic with a simple menu. Fast service even with a big line.

data.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
data.text: In-N-out is always a must stop whenever there is one in a town that I am visiting.  As always the service is fast and the food is fresh and good!!

data.title: Protein Animal Style Double
data.text: I get my double burger without a bun, so I order it PROTEIN style and ANIMAL style.  So the result is the double burger wrapped in large leaves of lettuce (protein) with grilled onions (animal).  Best burger I ever had!

data.title: Good fast food
data.text: Good fast food.....Fries animal style is the way to go.......one of the better fast food burgers you can get.....Clean restaurant. No complaints really.....

data.title: Always a good burger
data.text: If you been to one In-N-Out Burger you have been to them all. Always good no matter where you go. The fresh cut french fries are the bomb. The places are clean and the service is fast.

data.title: The best hamburgers around!
data.text:
In-N-Out is one-of-a- kind in my opinion and the best burger I have ever had.  The menu is simple and good. The employees are happy to be there and care about the food they cook and serve. 

If you haven't tried them you should run, not walk, as soon as possible to the In-N-Out nearest you. Beware, they are usually VERY busy but they are fast efficient. You will probably have a wait, but for me it's worth it!

data.title: In N Out -  Clean and Consistent
data.text: Great value.  The quality is always good and the simple menu always satisfies.  Services is fast and organized.

data.title: Parking sucks
data.text: This place is the normal place you would expect, busy and standard issue burgers.    The parking is fairly small considering it is in n out. There is a gas station next door so could make it simple on and off the freeway if traveling through.

data.title: Wow! Incredible!
data.text: The food was excellent and service was just as incredible!  I recommend the double double and animal fries!  The Animal fries are not on the menu!

data.title: Great burgers!
data.text: Take a trip back in time to the 60s and enjoy their burgers. Simple, perfect menu with polite, nice servers. Watch as they prepare your food for you. Deliciousness pure and simple 😋

data.title: Finally tried In-N-Out Burger
data.text:
I first heard of this chain from The Big Lebowski, and later through friends and family that lived in California.   On our recent trip, we were able to give it a try.   

It's a very limited menu - hamburger, cheeseburger, double, fries, drinks; and some merchandise.   We got through the line fairly quickly, and were sitting down  eating without a tremendous wait.   

Dinner was good, and gave me something to shoot off as a message to my old college roommate that he'd appreciate.

data.title: Standard In-N-Out Experience
data.text: In-N-Out has acquired a popularity wherever they are located due to the efficiency of their workers, moderate prices, and menu offerings.   I went the "drive through" route at about 10 pm and found myself behind about 5 cars waiting to pick up their orders.   For whatever the reason, the line moved more slowly than usual, but my food was delivered at the window fresh and hot.  Would I return?  Sure !

data.title: Excellent!!
data.text: Food was fresh and tasted wonderful !! Place was packed, but they were fully staffed and handled it all great! Staff was friendly and helpful!
